page.title: 14Welsh Water Authority
page.content: The main depot for the area is in the Fishguard Road Industrial Estate. Here we were told that the main local {source of water = Llysyfran Reservoir. Canaston takes raw rain/river water from Llysyfran Reservoir then pumps it to Bolton Hill, where it goes through:_ 3 STAGES TO MAKE THE WATER '''''''''''''''''''''''''' {POSSIBLE FOR US TO DRINK {'''''''''''''''''''''''' 1.The water has to be{FILTERED {THROUGH SAND; 2.It then has to be{DISINFECTED {WITH CHLORINE}in its form as a{GAS}(in this stage not much chlorine is added; in fact.... 6 PARTS of CHLORINE to....10 MILLION PARTS OF WATER); 3.River water is too acidy and so {LIME MUST BE ADDED.} n.b.NO FLUORIDE IN PEMBROKESHIRE WATER
